item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 12, 2024 at 3:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Gukesh becomes the youngest chess world champion in history (193 points | 81 comments)
2. Fermat's Last Theorem – how it's going (28 points | 3 comments)
3. Timemap.org – Interactive Map of History (324 points | 69 comments)
4. Oasis Security Research Team Discovers Microsoft Azure MFA Bypass (12 points | 11 comments)
5. Show HN: Quantus – LeetCode for Financial Modeling (37 points | 5 comments)
6. FCC opens entire 6 GHz band to low power device operations (642 points | 231 comments)
7. How a middle schooler found a new compound in a piece of goose poop (28 points | 8 comments)
8. Gemini 2.0: our new AI model for the agentic era (872 points | 438 comments)
9. Mysterious New Jersey drone sightings prompt call for 'state of emergency' (368 points | 595 comments)
10. Infracost (YC W21) Is Hiring a Founding Solutions Engineer (Remote) ( | hide)
11. Ham Radio All-in-One-Cable (167 points | 31 comments)
12. BlenderGPT (29 points | 12 comments)
13. QEMU with VirtIO GPU Vulkan Support (214 points | 45 comments)
14. Review of Mullvad VPN (392 points | 152 comments)
15. OnlyFans models are using AI impersonators to keep up with their DMs (301 points | 416 comments)
16. French Piracy Blocking Order Goes Global, DNS Service Quad9 Vows to Fight (18 points | 10 comments)
17. Pgroll – Zero-downtime, reversible, schema changes for PostgreSQL (new website) (247 points | 45 comments)
18. Can hunters' donations help deliver high-quality meat to Colorado food pantries? (5 points | 9 comments)
19. The Marvelous Disappearing Capacitor (44 points | 7 comments)
20. Retiring from Hanami/dry-rb/ROM-rb core teams (7 points | discuss)
21. Dear OAuth Providers (315 points | 90 comments)
22. The GPU is not always faster (179 points | 87 comments)
23. Evolving my ergonomic setup (or, my laptop with extra steps) (159 points | 92 comments)
24. Launch HN: Azalea Robotics (YC S24) – Baggage-handling robots for airports (117 points | 66 comments)
25. 2400 phone providers may be shut down by the FCC for failing to stop robocalls (393 points | 243 comments)
26. Dioxus 0.6 – Crossplatform apps with Rust (255 points | 104 comments)
27. The Cold Email Handbook (270 points | 154 comments)
28. WPEngine, Inc. vs. Automattic– Order on Motion for Preliminary Injunction (380 points | 167 comments)
29. Geometry clipmaps: simple terrain rendering with level of detail (2017) (27 points | 1 comment)
30. A letter to open-source maintainers (153 points | 64 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 12, 2024 at 3:20 PM UTC
